A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Disney KNOW they're in trouble. Thats why they're doing damage control here on RT and other sites.
 
Yes\, Last Jedi made them an easy Billion but in the long term\, they've irreparably damaged their most valuable brand. 
After all\, are YOU planning to see the "Han Solo Spinoff"? Or Episode 9 for that matter??

And consider this:
- Its 2nd week box office plunge is the worst in history. 
- It set a new record for biggest ever sequel-to-sequel box office decline.
- In Hollywood's largest overseas market (China) it opened to less than half its predecessor's opening\, then plunged 94% after the 1st week.  
- Its audience score on this site is 10% lower than Phantom Menace and by far the lowest in the saga... and thats with RT helping it!
- A petition demanding it 'struck from canon' has 85\,000 signatures.
- And now they're predicting a Han Solo movie flop!

Star Wars IS DEAD!
